name: Basaltic Ore
description: Raw planetary crust metals (iron, nickel, copper).

name: Ferrovite
description: Stronger minerals, found more deeply in planets.

name: Crytallite
description: Metallic crystal lattice grown under pressure; high conductivity.

name: Neutron-Forged Plate
description: Hyper-dense metal alloy forged under intense neutron radiation; hard to machine

name: Gravitic Mesh
description: Forged from the remnants of a neutron star, and condensed into solid metal mesh; virtually indestructible. Metal infused with gravity-manipulative particles.

name: Singularium
description: Forged from the remnants of a black hole, and condensed into solid metal mesh. Synthetic matter built from spacetime filaments.

name: Hydrolyte
description: Water with a strange affinity for metals, making it useful for electrolysis.

name: Vaporite
description: Water vaporized at extreme temperatures, compressed into a solid form.

name: Aqueous Nitrate
description: Water with a strange affinity for metals, making it useful for electrolysis.

name: Aquiferite
description: Water with a strange affinity for metals, making it useful for electrolysis.

name: Aqueous Sulfate
description: Water with a strange affinity for metals, making it useful for electrolysis.

name: Void Water
description: Water from a higher dimension, frozen in the vacuum of space.

name: Organifera
description: Raw biological material: plants, microbes, proteins. Used for food, basic medicine, colonist upkeep.

name: Organifera II
description: More complex biological materials

name: Symbiotic Culture
description: Engineered organisms functioning collectively.

name: Neural Biomass
description: Wetware capable of data processing.

name: Edenic Genome
description: Blueprint of perfected life; self-replicating. Used in Genetic terraforming, cloning.

name: Lifeflux Essence
description: Living energy form — part biomass, part psionic. Used in Ascension projects, god-like biology tech.

name: Volatite Gas
description: Common planetary atmosphere gases (methane, CO₂, nitrogen). Used in Fuel, chemical industry, early power.

name: Ion Vapor
description: Electrically charged gas mix. Used in Propulsion, power generation.

name: Plasma Condensate
description: Stabilized plasma in containment fields. Used in Weaponry, advanced reactors.

name: Quantum Vapor
description: Gas whose molecules fluctuate across states. Used in Cloaking tech.

name: Hyperfluid filament
description: Gas found rarely in quantum tide pools, resonant vortices created by stellar fields.

name: Aetherflow
description: Particles existing between dimensions. Used in FTL drives, wormhole generators.

name: Eventide Gas
description: Dark-energy infused vapor drawn from dying stars. Used as an ultimate energy source and in time/space manipulation.

name: Electro-Thermal Cells
description: Stored heat and electrical potential. Used in Early power plants, mining tools.

name: Fusion Isotopes
description: Hydrogen/helium fuels refined for reactors. Used in Mid-tier reactors, engines.

name: Quantum Flux
description: Particle energy states harnessed via entanglement. Used in High-tech weapons, data networks.

name: Zero-Point Ctalyst
description: Energy drawn from vacuum fluctuations. Used in Megacity power, shield tech.

name: Dark-Energy Core
description: Compressed dark energy stabilized by quantum shells. Used in FTL drives, wormhole stabilizers.

name: Stellar Heart
description: Direct harnessing of star cores or artificial suns. Used to powers Dyson spheres and in end-game megastructures.
